Use a Humidifier: A humidifier can add moisture to the air, which can help soothe and relieve cold symptoms.
Take Vitamins: Taking vitamins, especially those that are high in vitamin C, can help boost your immune system and reduce the severity of cold symptoms.
Get Plenty of Rest: Getting plenty of rest and sleep is essential for recovery from a cold.
Gargle with Salt Water: Gargling with salt water can help reduce inflammation and irritation in the throat.
Use a Neti Pot: A neti pot is a device that helps rinse your sinuses with saline solution, which can help relieve congestion and sinus pressure.
